评论概述: Cute top, soft and stretchy... SIZE DOWN!
评论详情: The material is very soft, thin and stretchy.  If you look closely at the advertised photos (the one with the black hat and glasses with her arm up to the hat brim...you can see there is plenty of room in the bust across the arm pits, so size down. Even the size chart says the bust  on a medium is 41.73 so size down if you don't want such a baggy look.  I bought this form my mom who is normally a large or extra large due to her waste but isn't large busted so this Medium fit her great and even went are her stomach.  I'm 5'4" and ~130 so I'm usually somewhere in between a size 4-6 ish and tried it just to see.  It was a bit too baggy so I'm glad I didn't order one for me.  I'll will be ordering a few of the size small because it is cute, thin and perfect for cooler weather.
Love the vneck, softness of the material, and color of this top.
